parodyAndFanAccounts.label: Parody, commentary, and fan accounts

accessibility.label: Accessibility
accessibility.value: Manage aspects of your momo experience, such as limiting color contrast and motion.

display.label: Display
display.value: Manage font size, color, and background. These settings affect all X accounts on this browser.

languages.label: Languages
languages.value: Manage which languages are used to personalize your momo experience.

dataUsage.label: Data usage
dataUsage.value: Limit how momo uses some of your network data on this device.

sessions.label: Sessions
sessions.value: See information about when you've logged in and the apps connected to your account.

connectedAccounts.label: Connected accounts
connectedAccounts.value: Manage the Google or Apple accounts connected to momo for logging in.
